Melanistic.flavor: Pitch black, blending perfectly into the shadows.

Albino.flavor: Stark white with red eyes, highly visible but imposing.

Leucistic.flavor: Pale and ghostly white, but with normal pigment in the eyes.

Erythristic.flavor: Possessing an unusual, vibrant reddish-copper hue.

Piebald.flavor: Large, unpigmented white patches breaking up its base color.
